CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** If the Item "Enable Assignments" and "Restrict Number of Assignments" fields are checked, the Item "Maximum Number of Assignments" x the Line "Quantity" is set. Otherwise no value is set.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** If the Item "Enable Assignments" and "Restrict Number of Assignments" fields are checked, the Item "Maximum Number of Assignments" x the Line "Quantity" is set. Otherwise no value is set.
CustomField.label: Assignments Allowed
